articles.title: McDonald’s Australia cuts breakfast hours due to bird flu - BBC.com
articles.description: The fast food giant is serving its full breakfast menu in the country until 10:30am, instead of midday.
articles.content:
Australian fans of a late morning McDonald's breakfast are having to wake up earlier.
The fast food giant has temporarily shortened the hours of its breakfast service in the country by 90 minutes du… [+1310 chars]
